--- title: "Debating Nudging and AI for Climate" author: - name: Elke Windschitl & Lewis White url: https://elkewind.github.io affiliation: UCSB Bren School affiliation-url: http://ucsb-meds.github.io date: 2022-12-19 categories: [MEDS] citation: url: https://elkewind.github.io/posts/2022-12-19-climate-ai-debate format: html: toc: true draft: false --- Description: This is a post sharing a short podcast by myself and Lewis White where we debate using nudging and AI for climate solutions. We chose sides for each topic at random. This podcast was created for a final assignment for EDS 242 Ethics and Bias in Environmental Data Science -- a course in UCSB's Master's of Environmental Data Science curriculum taught by Dena Montague. Music for the intro was provided by Bonfire Records. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} podcast <- "/Users/elkewindschitl/Documents/MEDS/eds-242/EDS-242-Final.mp4" ``` :::
